short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Join Scooby Doo and the gang for spooky fun with colorful visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Join the Mystery Inc. gang with the Scooby-Doo-themed live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A fun and colorful interface inspired by Scooby-Doo’s adventurous and spooky world.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that embodies the charm of solving mysteries with Scooby and the gang.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Enjoy Scooby-Doo-inspired mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as thrilling and quirky as Scooby’s escapades.
